relationships.description: Harry seized Ron's wrist as he raised his wand to try and escape from the Death Eaters.
The Death Eaters are trying to locate Harry, as mentioned when one of them tries to use the Summoning Charm on his cloak.
The Death Eaters are also trying to locate Ron, as mentioned when one of them tries to use the Summoning Charm on his cloak.
The Death Eaters are also trying to locate Hermione, as mentioned when one of them tries to use the Summoning Charm on her.
One of the Death Eaters raised his wand and stopped the scream, which was still echoing around the distant mountains.
